verbs.description: Deep breaths , people . [V: Leading] off [ARG1: Tuesday ’s MTP Daily] [ARGM-LOC: on MSNBC] , [ARG0: moderator Chuck Todd] let loose on some hyperbole and self - righteous speculation that America is amidst a “ constitutional crisis ” and “ fatal ” attack on “ the rule of law ” caused by Republicans demanding an investigation into alleged spying of the Trump campaign in the early stages of the Russia probe .
